plugin.name: lookups
plugin.author: Paul Fernley
plugin.title: Application lookup (reference tables) plugin
plugin.description: This plugin allows the creation and maintenance of pseudo reference (lookup) tables. Within the lookup system, you create 'realms' such as 'countries' or 'order.status' and can then create code/value pairs within those realms. The plugin comes with lookup and lookupValue controllers with associated screens that presume you are using a layout called main.
